title: Add a more personal animation effect to the Valentine experience

requirements.text: Add a new, additional animation/effect (beyond the existing floating hearts overlay) that makes the Valentine page feel more personal, and integrate it into the existing Valentine experience flow.

quotes: Everything‚Äôs ready ‚Äî want to add a small animation or effect to make the experience feel even more personal?

acceptanceCriteria: The page includes at least one new visual animation/effect that is distinct from the current FloatingHeartsOverlay.
The new effect does not block interaction with page content (buttons, scrolling, audio control).
The new effect performs smoothly on mobile and desktop and does not cause persistent layout shift.

requirements.text: Trigger the new animation/effect at an emotionally relevant moment in the existing user journey (e.g., when the user clicks either ‚ÄúYes ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù or ‚ÄúOf course Yes üíï‚Äù, and/or when the final section is revealed), without changing the existing copy.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking either proposal button triggers the new effect in addition to the existing final-section reveal + smooth scroll behavior.
All existing ValentinePage text content remains unchanged (English user-facing text stays as-is).
The final section still remains hidden on initial load and reveals only after a proposal button click.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components must be composed, not modified).
Do not edit immutable frontend hook paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: No backend changes (do not add Motoko methods or persistence for this request).
Do not add real-time features (no WebSockets or live messaging).
Do not introduce third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
